author: Vertyco
description: Ark: Survival Evolved server manager and crosschat.
end_user_data_statement: This is probably one of the more I/O heavy cogs available and is NOT intended to be run on extremely small devices/VMs due to the sheer amount of socket connections, API calls, and task loops it utilizes.\nThis cog stores Gamertag Names, XUIDs, Discord IDs, time played per map, and optional token data for Xbox self-host accounts.
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Use `[p]arktools` and `[p]help ArkTools` for more info.\n**Disclosure:** This cog is pretty optimized for how much it does, however it IS more I/O heavy than the average cog and uses more network traffic than most as well. It also stores user data, mainly gamertags, Xbox IDs and Discord IDs. Do **NOT** try to run this cog with a ton of servers on a really small device/VM. This cog also does NOT work for Nitrado servers, only Self-Hosted Steam/Crossplay servers
